strategy_signals: Buy on dips toward the 20–50 DMA zone (₹445–₹460)
Add on a sustained breakout and close above ₹471 with higher volume
Book partial profits near ₹485; ride remainder toward ₹515
Trail stop below the 20-DMA after breakout or use hard SL at ₹404
